    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public final void shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: Barrier
        Shutdown the barrier permanently.

        Any threads currently waiting on the barrier are woken and an InterruptedException will be thrown. Any threads attempting to Barrier.await(long, PaddedLong) after the barrier is closed will experience the same behaviour.

        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface Barrier

      • isShutdown

        public final boolean isShutdown()
        Description copied from interface: Barrier
        Accessor for the shutdown state of this barrier.
        Specified by:
        isShutdown in interface Barrier
        Returns:
        True if this barrier has been shutdown, false otherwise.

      • checkAndThrowIfShutdown

        protected final void checkAndThrowIfShutdown()
                                      throws InterruptedException
        Check whether the barrier is shutdown and throw an exception if it is.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - When the barrier is shutdown.
